attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This Petition has been created to ask The Prime Minister to stop all Manufactures from producing excessive packaging.
We are asking that manufactures are fined and or their refuse bills be increased substantially until they do reduce properly.
By Reducing Packaging we are helping the planet by Reducing Landfill and Reducing the need for Governments to use The Burn.
Please sign Our Petition and help protect our Environment
